definition: to go back to one's roots/to return to one's native place/by ext. to join one's ancestors (i.e. to die)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He dreams of the teaching job at Kabul University and of marrying a woman back home. She is the daughter of family friends a Sayed Shiite who traces her lineage to the prophet Muhammad.
sentences.chinese: 他梦想着在喀布尔大学任教，然后回老家娶媳妇。

sentences.english: The manager released him to return to his native town to visit his grandmother who was ill in bed.
sentences.chinese: 经理准许他休假回老家探视染病在床的祖母。

sentences.english: They are wanting to get home again, the stupid toads!
sentences.chinese: 这些傻东西这阵儿又想回老家啦。

sentences.english: Return home today to worship grandfather.
sentences.chinese: 今天要回老家祭拜外公。

sentences.english: I actually go home each month to visit my family.
sentences.chinese: 其实俺每个月都有回老家看看家里人。

sentences.english: According to the regulations concerned, he has only a couple of weeks (more than ten days) every four years to visit his relatives.
sentences.chinese: 期间按规定每四年才能有十多天的时间回老家省亲。

sentences.english: Later, yellow marshal be transferred to civilian work answered native place to become a 88 buses driver.
sentences.chinese: 后来，黄元帅转业回老家当了一名88路公交车司机。

sentences.english: A native of the province, he hasn't been home for eight years.
sentences.chinese: 卢炜是湖南人，已经八年没回老家了。

sentences.english: We sent the enemy home with their tails between their legs.
sentences.chinese: 我们把敌人打得夹着尾巴逃回老家了。

sentences.english: Every year in April to clear when, we have to drive back home early graves.
sentences.chinese: 每年四月清明的时候，我们都要起早驱车回老家扫墓。

sentences.english: Nothing special. I will go back to my hometown and stay with my family.
sentences.chinese: 没有特别的计划，就是回老家跟家人在一起。

definition: native place/place of origin/home state or region
(of a wife) to return to her parental home/(fig.) to return to one's old place, job, school etc
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
to go on an official or business trip
to go to work/to be on duty/to start work/to go to the office
to go home to visit one's family
parts of the country other than where one is
